name: DhiWise - Figma to Code
description:
DhiWise Figma to code

Convert Figma designs to clean, scalable and responsive code in minutes for Android (Kotlin), iOS (Swift) and Flutter mobile applications FOR FREE 🤯

Generates design to code before your coffee gets cold! 😉 ****

  • Install the plugin and sign in/sign up
  • Select the technology in which you need the code (iOS (Swift), Flutter, or Android (Kotlin))
  • Wait for a few minutes and receive the downloadable source code in your registered email


Why use Dhiwise? 🤭

  • Support of a wide range of UI components and generates executable code.
  • Responsive code that works on all mobile devices!
  • DhiWise identifies duplicate screens, components, and awful variable names to provide you better code readability and quality.
  • Become a clean coder with CC (Clean Code) architecture that makes apps scalable and easy to maintain.
  • The generated source code is debugged and downloadable within minutes.
  • Prototype supported - Actions added while prototyping Figma design will also be captured in the generated code.
  • Export code from DhiWise and integrate it into your current projects!


Limitations ⚠️

We are reliant on your designs being created using standard design practices or guidelines. Still many of the designs might not be identified due to being unique or complex designs.

Easy solutions! 👇

⛑️ Hint: Create Figma design for your application using standard design guidelines in mind to get maximum accuracy for your design.

Explore our UI kit & Guidelines to get a better design-to-code accuracy 🤘

Join our awesome tech community on Discord! 💃


What else can you do with DhiWise? 💪

DhiWise is made to increase productivity with total code ownership, & build full stack apps! 🚀

**Sign in to DhiWise** & build the basic setup of their web & mobile app in just a few hours and focus on things that matters most! With DhiWise you can set-up/manage following features in your mobile apps :

  • Integrate APIs by uploading postman collection (Data to view and View to data binding support)
  • Set up permissions (Camera, Gallery and others)
  • Alert box (Snack bar, Toast and Alert)
  • Manage navigation (With back navigation support)
  • Firebase integration
  • Social authentication (Google and Facebook)
  • Manage lifecycle
  • Preview ****your ****Flutter design in action on DhiWise


Explore our UI kit & Guidelines to get a better design-to-code accuracy 🤘

Join our awesome tech community on Discord! 💃

Feedback and improvements are welcome, please drop us an email at help@dhiwise.com.

Made with ❤️ by Dhiwise.
